item.title: Freelance Image Editor and Creative Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
We are retail company specialising in homewares . We are dedicated to delivering high-quality content and creative solutions as part of our marketing services. We are currently seeking talented freelance Image Editors who will be responsible for creating, editing, and enhancing visual content to meet the highest standards of quality and creativity. This role requires a keen eye for detail, a passion for visual storytelling, and proficiency in industry-standard software. Successful candidates will undergo initial training within UK hours, after which they will be able to work within their own time zones, providing flexibility and convenience.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Edit and enhance images using Adobe Photoshop, Lightroom, and Illustrator to produce high-quality visual content.
- Collaborate with photographers, designers, and other team members to understand project requirements and deliver creative solutions.
- Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to brand guidelines.
- Assist in the creation of digital assets, including social media graphics, website images, and marketing materials.
- Retouch and color-correct images to achieve desired aesthetics and visual consistency.
- Organize and maintain a digital library of images, ensuring easy access and efficient workflow.
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and new techniques to continuously improve the quality of work.
- Assist with other creative tasks as needed, including basic design work and layout preparation.
- Create outputs such as leaflets, catalogues, social media content for instagram, pinterest, tiktok, email marketing content, website content

**Key Skills and Qualifications:**

- Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Lightroom, and Illustrator is essential.
- proficiency in social channels output
- Strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in image editing and creative design.
- Excellent eye for detail, color, and composition.
- Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills.
- Basic understanding of photography principles is a plus.
- Creativity and a passion for visual storytelling.
- Ability to take direction and work independently with minimal supervision.
- Experience with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects) is a plus.

**What We Offer:**

- Competitive freelance rates.
- Opportunity to work with a creative and collaborative team.
- Flexible working hours, allowing you to work within your own time zone.
- Initial training within UK hours to ensure familiarity with our processes and standards.
- Ongoing professional development and growth opportunities.

**How to Apply:**

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume, cover letter, and a portfolio of relevant work

Hourly Range: $6.00-$11.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 18:13 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:Adobe Lightroom, Adobe Photoshop Elements, Still Life, Lifestyle Photography, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe Lightroom, Adobe Photoshop Elements, Still Life, Lifestyle Photography, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Looking For Youtube Expert For Faceless Channels - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube automation Expert to Manage and Grow our YouTube channels from Ground Up in selected niches for our clients.

This a complete execution project, where you will be responsible for creating the complete videos on topics provided by us.

You should have experience or a team with  :

- Voice Over Artists
- Video Editors
- Thumbnail Designers
- Researchers and Script Writers
- Expert Youtube channel Managers

This is a long-term opportunity and we will trust you with the growth and scaling of the channel.
We are looking to monetize the channel in 3-6 Months organically by producing content that aligns with YouTube guidelines.

Our main hiring parameter is results you must have result result-oriented portfolio.

Please apply only if you have experience in growing a channel from scratch to millions.

Happy to Pay $40 Per video at the start and scale to $65 per video going forward for video production

Monthly - 5-10 Videos
Duration - 8 to 10 Mins


Niches: Crime, Sports, Finance, Top 10, Korean and others.
Reference - https://www.youtube.com/@CrazyforCrime-gj9nj/videos


Hourly Range: $14.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 18:12 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, YouTube Automation
Skills: YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, YouTube Automation
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video describing lending product - Upwork
item.description:
Purpose: To create a video that explains Moneta's innovative SME lending process.

Company Overview: Moneta offers rapid, paperless financing for SMEs in Southeast Asia, addressing the $90 billion credit gap with advanced technology.

Video Details: The video (up to 60 seconds) will be cartoon-style with minimal animation. It will demonstrate the steps of the lending process, including registration, KYC document upload, account connections, data checks, virtual account creation, and receiving offers. The focus is on simplicity, user experience, and the speed of the process, highlighting a 2-day turnaround for funds.

Additional Notes: Emphasize the unique features and efficiency of Moneta's services.

Description: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/19MhwYbP7shgn0P2kuLii2znRrpMB4mftocu54U9CcJE/edit#slide=id.g2e8fb7755f2_0_123

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 30, 2024 18:05 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Editing
Skills: Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Editing
Country: Indonesia
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager/Graphic Designer for Executive Coach and Author - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a creative and strategic social media manager with a flair for graphic design? Do you have a passion for building brands and engaging audiences? If so, we’d love to hear from you!

I’m Cynthia, an executive coach, author, and speaker based in Sewickley, Pennsylvania. My goal is to add value through every piece of content I create, building my brand and engaging my audience. I’m seeking a talented individual who can help elevate my social media presence and create visually compelling content that aligns with my brand.

Responsibilities:
Develop and implement a comprehensive social media strategy to increase brand awareness and engagement.
Create and design visually appealing graphics, infographics, and promotional materials for social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, and TikTok).
Schedule and post content consistently across all social media channels.
Monitor and analyze social media performance using analytics tools, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.
Engage with followers, respond to comments and messages in a timely manner.
Stay updated on the latest social media trends and best practices.
Collaborate with me to align content with my brand voice and messaging.
Requirements:
Proven experience as a social media manager and graphic designer.
Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator) or equivalent.
Strong understanding of social media platforms and their algorithms.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.
Familiarity with analytics tools and ability to interpret data.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience working with personal brands, authors, or executive coaches.
Familiarity with video editing tools and creating video content.
Understanding of content marketing and SEO principles.
To Apply:
If you’re passionate about social media and design, and excited about the opportunity to work with an executive coach and author, I’d love to hear from you! Please submit your application with the following:

A brief cover letter outlining your experience and why you’re a good fit for this role.
Your portfolio showcasing your graphic design work and any social media campaigns you’ve managed.
Examples of social media accounts you’ve managed (if applicable).
Your proposed hourly rate or project rate.
I look forward to working with a dedicated professional who can help take my brand to the next level!

Hourly Range: $17.00-$59.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 17:52 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Community Management, Social Media Engagement, Display Ad, Video Advertising, HR & Business Services, TikTok, Instagram, Social Media Management, LinkedIn, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Community Management, Social Media Engagement, Display Ad, Video Advertising, HR & Business Services, TikTok, Instagram, Social Media Management, LinkedIn, Marketing Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Creator for Supplement Brand - Upwork
item.description:
COMPENSATION: $300 for 30 videos per month + 15% of all sales generated!

We are looking for a content creator with experience making videos for Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, or TikTok. You should be confident and at ease when speaking on camera.

The job involves creating 30 videos per month. Most of these videos are short (1-2min), do not require editing, and don't involve much creative stress. We will guide you on what to say and how to say it.

The commissions generated by your videos, can tracked through the TikTok dashboard and claim whenever you wish.

Some of our top creators earn between $1000-$2000 per month just in commissions.

Reach out to us if you're interested

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 30, 2024 17:50 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:UGC, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, TikTok Marketing
Skills: UGC, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, TikTok Marketing
Country: United States

item.title: Videography and Promo videos for our dental clinic in Vancouver - Upwork
item.description:
Project Job Description: Videographer and Video Editor

We are seeking a skilled and creative Videographer and Video Editor for a high-quality video production project for our luxury dental clinic in Downtown Vancouver. The project involves creating multiple promotional videos for various purposes, including conference presentations, website content, and social media campaigns.

Project Duration: August to September 2024

Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate directly with the clinic owner to develop concepts and scripts for each video
Plan and execute on-site video shoots at our downtown Vancouver location
Provide all necessary equipment for high-quality video and audio recording
Edit footage to create compelling, visually stunning videos in both vertical and horizontal formats
Incorporate music, voice-overs, and graphics as needed
Ensure all videos adhere to patient privacy regulations (no patient names or identifying information)

Required Videos:
Conference Presentation Video (30 seconds, horizontal)
Website Video (30 seconds, horizontal with potential vertical version)
Organic Social Media Video (30-60 seconds, vertical and horizontal)
Social Media Ad Campaign Video (15-30 seconds, vertical and horizontal)
Clinic Tour Video (Up to 1 minute, horizontal with vertical cuts)
Technology and In-House Lab Video (30-60 seconds, vertical and horizontal)

Style Reference:
We have a previous video that exemplifies the style and quality we're aiming for in this project. Applicants are encouraged to review this video to better understand our clinic's aesthetic and the level of professionalism we expect. The video can be viewed at:
https://youtu.be/MnpegPPC_NU?feature=shared
https://youtu.be/ThmhfIww8ZI?feature=shared

Qualifications:
Proven experience in videography and video editing, particularly in the luxury or medical fields
Strong portfolio demonstrating high-quality, stylish video production
Proficiency with professional video and editing equipment and software
Excellent communication and collaborative skills
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
Creative vision aligned with a luxury, high-quality, chic, and exclusive style

Additional Requirements:
Must provide own equipment
Flexible availability for on-site shooting (to be scheduled with our team)
Ability to start in August and complete the project by the end of September

To Apply: Please submit your portfolio, a brief introduction, and a detailed proposal including your project approach and pricing structure. We look forward to reviewing your creative vision for our clinic's video content.


Budget: $2,500
Posted On: June 30, 2024 17:34 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, People, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Business, People, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Ad Creative - Direct Response Ad Cooywriting & Planning - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there. Do you have experience in creative strategist for Meta Ad? Because I need someone to provide ad concept on video and image ad from different creative concepts, market sophistications, desires, etc. I’m looking for monthly role. So you will

1. Plan the ad creative from different angles
2. give concept for image ad to designer so they can design in mass
3. Give script (with help of ChatGPT) for video editor to create video based on your flow


I need weekly 10-15 completely new creative concepts/ angles per week. Each concept gets different slight design variations for each variation around 5 variations

I need this guy to be the key driver on my meta ad content system that generate at least 200 variation of ads (video & statics) every month

The ad need to be different creative concepts, reference from competitor ads, marketing sophistications, mass desire, etc

The person’s role is to make and plan creative concepts and brief my designer and video editor so that they create the static or video ad based on your brief

I need to build a creative system That churn out creative consistently in different angles and variations. Based on your creative concept brief

Target around 50 key different creative concepts per months and 4 variations for each concepts

Hourly Range: $18.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 17:31 UTC
Category: Creative Direction
Skills:Marketing Strategy, Advertising, Copywriting, Graphic Design, Facebook, Ad Copy
Skills: Marketing Strategy, Advertising, Copywriting, Graphic Design, Facebook, Ad Copy
Country: Hong Kong
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor | LONG TERM | Celebrities - | Youtube Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor | LONG TERM | podcast- celebrities | Youtube Agency
Take a look at this video, note the editing details throughout.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3ZneJopL1M

Are you able to edit a video like this?

The goal is to edit 2-3 weekly videos of 20 minutes each, at least.

The price per edited minute is $1. Weekly Total 60$. Monthly equals 240$.

The editing of each video must be ready in 2 days.

We´re looking for someone with the following requirements

1º Fast response times
2º Good understanding of storytelling and youtube retention.
3º No use of stock content.

***[IMPORTANT] Your offer WON'T be read if you do not attach previous video editing work.

If you feel confident to do this style of editing, send me a message to start today.

item.title: Youtube video editor - Upwork
item.description:
We just started a Youtube channel and need a video editor.  This will be in the talking head format, and need title cards, pictures and video clips added, as well as music added.  This will be in the history niche.

We've got templates for most for this (except the music), and can provide pics and videos when needed, if it's outside your scope of work.

We're covering serious topics but want to have some fun with them. We need someone who can add GIFs and Memes into our videos to help add some levity to them. The presenter will be having fun with the subject as well, and you'll just be working with that.

We'd love someone who has experience with quick cuts - aka TikTok style videos - as well as having a sense of humor with some heavier topics (while being respectful, of course)

We're happy to work with college students if you have the chops.

We want 2, hour long videos per month, as well as 4-8 shorts per month. One of the hour long episodes goes out every two weeks. The shorts would go out on the other weeks.

Here's some video examples of styles we like: (The humor mixed with the serious tone is a major theme we're highlighting here)

Their channel: https://www.youtube.com/@TheCasualCriminalist
An example video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3BhOA9NHGdQ

Their channel: https://www.youtube.com/@EllieDashwood
An example video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o0vYtSf2iP8&t=19s

Their channel: https://www.youtube.com/@RoyaltyNowStudios
An example video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x1Tq09AP1LQ&t=27s

Thanks!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 17:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
